title: Did Sean Penn say he's moving to Venezuela because Bryce... Was Maduro "better than Trump "?
subtitle: Maybe it's safe to say the actor would be pissed if US President Donald Trump won the reelection in 2020, but is Ben leaving the country?
author: Dan Evon
vclaim: American actor Sean Penn said, "President Nicolas Maduro of Venezuela is much better than Trump, any day, no doubt... If Trump wins again, I move my family to Venezuela where they'll be safe!"
